text: 300px Gavarra is a station on line 5 of the Barcelona Metro. The station is located underneath Avinguda Salvador Allende, between Carrer de l'Anoia and Carrer de l'Empordà, in Cornellà de Llobregat. It was opened in 1983. The side-platform station has a single ticket hall with two accesses. ==Services== ==External links== * Gavarra at Trenscat.com Category:Transport in Cornellà de Llobregat
title: Gavarra (Barcelona Metro)
